text: Verla Eileen Regina Brennan (née Brennen; September 3, 1932 – July 28, 2013) was an American television, movie and theater actress. She received an Oscar nomination for the movie Private Benjamin. She received Emmy nominations for guest starring roles on Newhart and Will and Grace. Brennan was born in Los Angeles, California on September 3, 1932. She was married to David John Lampson from 1968 until they divorced in 1974. They had two children. Brennan died on July 28, 2013 in Burbank, California from bladder cancer, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:Emmy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from bladder cancer Category:1932 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Eileen Brennan
